description: Try our easy to follow Roast Beet & Walnut Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Spinach,Dairy free,Beetroot,Peanut free
name: Roast Beet & Walnut Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red onion, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Place onion, beetroot, carrot and capsicum into a roasting pan. Combine oil and garlic in a bowl. Drizzle over vegetables and toss to coat. Season and bake for 30 minutes or until vegetables are tender and golden.
Place spinach on serving dishes. Top with veggies. Add walnuts and serve.
